name: Fairground 2
description:
Fairground 2 - Fun Ride Simulator
Experience 15 faithful reproductions of the world's most famous rollercoasters and fairground rides in a realistic simulation, including Booster, Breakdance, Flyaway, Condor, ToppleTower and many more.
Admire, control and experience all the attractions at any time of day in a realistically designed theme park environment.

Features:
-15 true-to-life attractions under original license by HUSS® Park Attractions
-Intuitive controls
-Create your own operating programs and share them with your friends
-Ten operating programs can be recorded per attraction and played back at any time
-Accompany your operating programs with one of over 30 included pieces of music
-Special effects, such as spotlights, strobe lighting, lasers, scanners, fog, fire and water allow for unique operating programs
-Experience the attractions in various weather conditions
-Different camera angles (on-ride, off-ride) provide an immersive experience
-Elaborately themed park environment
-Park visitors add to the atmosphere
